channel.title: King suggestion
channel.description: I think that new kings should inherit night executions. So if the first king never used either of them, the new king would get both of them, or if the first king used one of them then the new king would get one that they could use.

item.title: King suggestion
item.dc:creator: Sam17z
item.description:
I disagree because then there is no harm in lynching the king and putting up a confirmed Bd king with the same abilites besides the chance of a 1 day no vote and the loss of 2 guards. This is a risk myself and most players would take to put up a confirmed BD king. Then you do the whisper king meta.

Read full topic

item.title: King suggestion
item.dc:creator: Firekitten
item.description:
No no and no!

Believe it or not the NK kills the first king because of that. And other factors

Read full topic

item.title: King suggestion
item.dc:creator: dlxhazedxlb
item.description:
I think that new kings should inherit night executions. So if the first king never used either of them, the new king would get both of them, or if the first king used one of them then the new king would get one that they could use.
